metadata.title: Acts Interpretation Acts - Comprehensive Research
metadata.description: Critical statutory definitions that apply as DEFAULT interpretations when an Act does not define a term itself
metadata.purpose: Foundation for legal NLP and statutory interpretation systems

person.definition: Includes a body politic or corporate as well as an individual
person.legal_significance: Extends rights and obligations to corporations

month.definition: A period starting at the beginning of any day of one of the 12 named months and ending immediately before the beginning of the corresponding day of the next named month, or at the end of the next named month if there is no corresponding day
month.legal_significance: Calculation of time periods in legislation

may.definition: Indicates that the act or thing may be done or not done at discretion

writing.definition: Includes any mode of representing or reproducing words in a visible form
writing.legal_significance: Extends to electronic documents, not just paper

document.definition: Includes any paper or other material on which there is writing, any disk, tape or other article or any other thing from which sounds, images or writings can be reproduced

business_day.definition: Day that is not a Saturday, Sunday or public holiday
business_day.legal_significance: Time calculations for filing, service, compliance

gender_neutral_provisions.title: Gender and number
gender_neutral_provisions.rule: Words importing a gender include every other gender
gender_neutral_provisions.significance: All legislation read as gender-neutral unless context requires otherwise

headings_and_marginal_notes.title: Headings, schedules, marginal notes, footnotes and endnotes
headings_and_marginal_notes.rule: Headings to sections and subsections, schedules, marginal notes, footnotes and endnotes are part of an Act
headings_and_marginal_notes.significance: Can be used as interpretive aids

commencement.default_rule: Where no commencement date specified, Act commences on 28th day after Royal Assent

person_includes_corporations.variations: All jurisdictions extend 'person' to corporations, with minor wording differences
person_includes_corporations.significance: Fundamental principle: corporate legal personality across Australia

month_as_calendar_month.significance: Consistent time calculation across all Australian legislation

must_as_mandatory.rule: All modern Acts use 'must' for mandatory requirements
must_as_mandatory.note: Some older Acts use 'shall' but meaning is same

gender_neutrality.modern_trend: Draft in gender-neutral language from start

priority_order: 1. Act-specific definition (in Definitions section or where defined)
